level.heading: Agency actions governed by Administrative Procedure Act.
level.text: Except as provided in subsection (e) of § 42-2704.02, all actions of the Agency shall be conducted in accordance with the District of Columbia Administrative Procedure Act (§ 2-501 et seq.).

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 2-135
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 2-135, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 42-2701.01.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 4-28
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 4-28, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 42-2701.02.
